content.rendered:
Your listing will expire a month after the move-in date you selected when you created your listing.

We’ll send you an email to ask if your room is still available three weeks after your move-in date.

You can change the move-in date at any time by editing your room listing and you will need a listing credit to be able to reactivate it.

excerpt.rendered: Your listing will expire a month after the move-in date you selected when you created your listing. We’ll send you an email to ask if your room is still available…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Why do my listings keep getting deactivated?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Whenever certain changes are done to your listing after it was first published such as (changing location, move-in date, photos, and so on) your listing will go back to pending and it will be re-approved making use of one listing credit. Please be advised that you will need to have…

jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I create a listing on Roomi?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: You can make use of your two free credits to create two free listings on your Roomi account to post your available room or rooms for rent on Roomi. You must be in Lister Mode to post a listing.  Please reference our Help Center article, 'How do I switch between…

jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I boost my listing?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We offer the option to boost your listing if you need to fill your room quickly. This feature pushes your listing to the top of the search page in your area, enabling users to see your room first when searching for a place. Listing Boosts are non-refundable Web Login to…

jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I permanently delete my room listing?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Web Please note: Your listing must be deactivated before it can be deleted. Login to your Roomi account from our homepage and click My ListingsClick the Inactive tabClick the trash can icon to delete your listing iOS Tap on My Listings from the menu at the bottomTap the X icon…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Why is the status of my listing marked ‘Insufficient’ or ‘Rejected’?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: If your listing is in 'Insufficient' or 'Rejected' status, you'll receive an in-app message from our Listings Team letting you know what needs to be completed to get your room listing up and running.Common reasons for 'Insufficient' or 'Rejected' status: We need to verify your residency at the address listedThe…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Can I list multiple rooms?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Roomi only allows multiple rooms if they are at the same address. If you have multiple bedrooms in your house or apartment for rent, please create a separate listing for each bedroom, you will require a listing credit for each room you are posting, you can only create or activate…
